title: Alms4Grandy

title: xkcDaily
description: Schedule some laughter in your day with this calendar app that displays and saves xkcd comics.
about: Worked in a group of 4 primarily in the back-end using pair programming to set up passport and sequelize models. We then worked as a team to connect the front and back end.
tools: Tools used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, My SQL, Express, Node, Passport, jQuery, API calls.
